text: The 2004 FC Rubin Kazan season was the club's 2nd season in the Russian Premier League, the highest tier of association football in Russia. They finished the season in tenth position, were knocked out of the UEFA Cup in the Second qualifying round by Rapid Wien and reached the Last 16 of the 2003–04 Russian Cup and Last 32 of the 2004–05 Russian Cup. ==Season review== ==Squad== http://www.rsssf.com/tablesr/rus04squads.html {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:100%;" |- !
